thread.title: Trump Tells Service Members At Fla. Base: ‘We Have Your Back’
thread.title_full: Trump Tells Service Members At Fla. Base: ‘We Have Your Back’

author: Jack Davis
title: Trump Tells Service Members At Fla. Base: ‘We Have Your Back’
text:
Democrat Labels Trump A ‘Dictator’ For Wanting Cabinet Nominees Confirmed 
Trump said he would give the military the tools needed to do the job. 
“We’re going to be loading it up with beautiful new planes and beautiful new equipment,” he said. “You’ve been lacking equipment. We’re going to load it up.” 
Trump noted that America will not act alone. 
“We strongly support NATO ,” Trump said. “We only ask that all of the NATO members make their full and proper financial contributions to the NATO alliance, which many of them have not been doing.” 
Saying “ radical Islamic terrorists are determined to strike our homeland,” Trump took a swipe at the news media. 
“It’s gotten to a point where it’s not even being reported,” he said. “And in many cases, the very, very dishonest press doesn’t want to report it.” 
Trump took a more positive note when he spoke to the troops about their support for his candidacy. 
“We had a wonderful election didn’t we? And I saw those numbers, and you like me and I like you,” Trump said. 
During his visit, Trump made small talk with the service members he met, praising the New England Patriots and also talking up military careers . 
“Gonna make it a career?” Trump asked one service member. 
“C’mon, you have to stay,” he urged another. What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
